channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop

item.title: CVE-2024-34116|2024-08-07T14:55:12.015Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop versions 6.1.0.587 and earlier are affected by an Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability that could result in a security feature bypass. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to load and execute malicious libraries, leading to arbitrary file delete. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction.
